Title: The Fox and the Hound 2
Writer: Rich Burns (screenplay by), Roger S.H. Schulman (screenplay by)
Actors: Reba McEntire, Patrick Swayze, Jonah Bobo, Harrison Fahn
Plot: Tod and Copper still go together like an itch and a scratch, but when Copper gets a shot at the big time with a nutty group of hound dog howlers, their purebred friendship is put to the test.
